parameters.fieldsToInclude: ['Candidate ID'], ['Job Description (LINKS ONLY)'], ['Enter detailed requirement that the company actually needs. Add any other remarks.'], ['Final Output '], ['Hiring Urgency'], ['Is immediate joiner mandatory?']

attributes.name: Educational qualification
attributes.description: Summary of your academic career. Focus on your high school and university studies. years of experience Summarize in 100 words maximum and also include your grade if applicable.

attributes.name: Job History
attributes.description: Work history summary. Focus on your most recent work experiences. Summarize in 100 words maximum

attributes.name: Skills
attributes.description: Extract the candidate’s technical skills. What software and frameworks they are proficient in. Make a bulleted list.

options.systemPromptTemplate:
You are an expert extraction algorithm.
Only extract relevant information from the text.
If you do not know the value of an attribute asked to extract, you may omit the attribute's value.

You are an expert extraction algorithm.
Only extract relevant information from the text.
If you do not know the value of an attribute asked to extract, you may omit the attribute's value.

parameters.text:
=You are an HR expert and you need to understand if the candidate is in line with the profile sought by the company.

Instructions:
- Give a vote from 1 to 10, where 1 = not aligned at all, 10 = ideal candidate.
- In the "consideration" field, explain why you gave that vote.
- Only rate above 8.5 if the candidate meets **must-have** experience.
-Consider joining status as well

---
**Must-Have Experience:**
{{ $json.mustHaves || 'No must-have requirements specified' }}

**Company Requirements Summary:**
{{ JSON.stringify($json.jobDescription) || 'No company requirements available' }}

**Candidate Summary:**
{{ $json.candidateProfile || 'No candidate summary available' }}

**Join Time:**
{{ $json.joinTime || 'No Join Time available' }}

**Hiring Urgency:**
{{ $json.hiringUrgency || 'No Hiring Urgency available' }}

---
Return your output in JSON:
{ "Candidate ID":{{ $json.candidateId }}
  "score": 1–10,
  "consideration": "...",
  "Final Output": "Select/Reject"
}

messageValues.message: You are an HR expert and you need to understand if the candidate is in line with the profile sought by the company. You must give a vote from 1 to 10 where 1 means that the candidate is not in line with what is required while 10 means that he is the ideal candidate because he fully reflects the profile sought. Furthermore, in the "consideration" field, explain why you gave that vote.. if you think the candidate can be rated above  8.5 keeping in consideration  that  he matches must be or have experience. Give the final output as accept or reject in the  Final Output

assignments.name: mustHave
assignments.value: ={{ $json['[\'Enter detailed requirement that the company actually needs. Add any other remarks.\']'] }}
